LanguageData.QuesterMeme_QuestComplete_DangerousSucce: We triumphed, even though the odds were against us!
We... failed. Clearly we need to prepare more for next time.
LanguageData.QuesterMeme_QuestComplete_FailAutoAccept: We... failed. I mean it's not like we had a say in accepting this quest, but our inaction still haunts my dreams.
LanguageData.QuesterMeme_QuestExpired.stages.0.label: unaccepted quest expired
LanguageData.QuesterMeme_QuestExpired.stages.0.descri: We passed up on an opportunity to partake in a quest. Who knows what we could've discovered!
